live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.

54960.summary: Some customers in the Gleneagles area of West Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
54960.title: Nov 9 - West Vancouver (Gleneagles) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
